title: Zapfhahn
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of Nov 2014, has one vegetarian and one vegan burger, clearly marked, on the menu. All other burgers can be served with a vegan bean patty. Atmosphere is rustic and relaxed. Serves self-brewed beer. Located in the centre of Bamberg near Cathedral.
